item.title: After I spent over 400£, I realised...
item.description: I spent over 400£ on betting on EURO Cup 2024 and I lost 144£ . Of course, it might not sound too much, but the point I want to make is not how much I lost rather what lessons I got from it and what YOU can to do avoid. Realisations stroke me last night when I lost 18 consecutive bets. No matter what strategy I use or how smart I think I can beat the bookmaker, statistically I will lose on the long run, this is how the bookmakers make money from the bettors.
